 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סַרְבָּל‎</span>] **noun [masculine]** probably ==mantle== (see especially [[BDB#Cook|SAC]]<sup>JPhil. xxvi (1899), 307 f.</sup>, compare [[BDB#Andr|Andr]]<sup>M 74\*</sup>, with conjecture as to original Persian form; &gt; ***trousers***; Late Hebrew; Jewish-Aramaic ***id.***, with both meanings, also ***shoes***; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***mantle*** is loan-word [[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>47</sup>; Egyptian Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***shoe*** is Greek loan-word according to Vollers<sup>ZMG li (1897), 298,</sup> compare [[BDB#Krauss|Krauss]]<sup>ii. 412</sup>); — plural suffix <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎סַרְבָּלֵיהוֺן‎</span> [[Dan.3.21|Dan 3:21]]; [[Dan.3.27|Dan 3:27]].
